coref: the Ass had become close comrades, and were constantly in each other's company. While the Ass cropped a fresh bit of greens, Fox would devour a chicken from the neighboring farmyard or a bit of cheese filched from the dairy. One day the pair unexpectedly met a Lion. the Ass was very much frightened, but Fox Fox calmed Fox fears. I will talk to Fox, Fox said, So Fox Fox walked boldly up to a Lion. Your highness, Fox said in an undertone, so the Ass the Ass could not hear Fox, I've got a fine scheme in my head. If you promise not to hurt me, I will lead that foolish creature yonder into a pit where Fox can't get out, and you can feast at your pleasure. a Lion a Lion agreed and Fox Fox returned to the Ass. I made Fox promise not to hurt us, said Fox. But come, I know a good place to hide till Fox is gone. So Fox Fox led the Ass into a deep pit. But when a Lion a Lion saw that the Ass the Ass was a Lion for the taking, a Lion first of all struck down Fox.
